channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Delhi Trudges Through Another Air Pollution Nightmare
item.description: The government seems powerless to protect its citizens from this annual crisis, let alone prevent it.

item.title: Out of Gaza
item.description: We photographed badly wounded Gazans who made it out for treatment. Many can think of little but the dead they left behind. “We wanted to go with them...

item.title: Instagram feed filled with junk? Site tests way for you to ‘reset’ suggestions
item.description: Update “will soon roll out globally,” Meta says.

item.title: As Pelicot Rape Trial Nears End in France, Wife Speaks of ‘Banality’
item.description: Gisèle Pelicot made her final address to the court, calling the things her husband allegedly did to her ‘unforgivable.’

item.title: Ukraine Fired U.S.-Made Missiles Into Russia for First Time, Officials Say
item.description: The attack came just days after President Biden gave Ukraine permission to use the weapons to strike targets inside Russia.

item.title: Medicare Part B is getting more expensive and outpacing inflation. Here’s what you can expect to pay in 2025
item.description: The increase “is mainly due to projected price changes and assumed utilization increases that are consistent with historical experience,” according to...

item.title: Behind Jake and Logan Paul’s $200 million plus business empire: From Netflix Mike Tyson fight to Prime Energy
item.description: The Vine turned YouTube turned TikTok turned boxing star siblings have raked in millions from endorsements and product lauches.

item.title: What a School Performance Shows Us About Japanese Education
item.description: A look into the Japanese educational system’s delicate balancing of teamwork, discipline and personal growth.

item.title: Putin Lowers Nuclear Weapons Threshold After U.S. Allows Ukraine to Use Missiles Against Russia
item.description: A decree signed by the Russian leader, though long-planned, came days after President Biden authorized the use of U.S.-supplied long-range missiles by...

item.title: Blackstone acquires Jersey Mike’s sandwich chain with plans to ‘accelerate its expansion’
item.description: The transaction is "intended to help enable Jersey Mike’s to accelerate its expansion across and beyond the U.S. market," the companies said.

item.title: As Pelicot Rape Trial Nears End in France, Wife Speaks of ‘Banality’
item.description: Gisèle Pelicot made her final address to the court, calling the things her husband allegedly did to her ‘unforgivable.’

item.title: Putin Lowers Nuclear Weapons Threshold After U.S. Allows Ukraine to Use Missiles Against Russia
item.description: A decree signed by the Russian leader, though long-planned, came days after President Biden authorized the use of U.S.-supplied long-range missiles by...

item.title: Ukraine Fired U.S.-Made Missiles Into Russia for First Time, Officials Say
item.description: The attack came just days after President Biden gave Ukraine permission to use the weapons to strike targets inside Russia.

item.title: Bob Love, Rugged, High-Scoring All-Star for Chicago Bulls, Dies at 81
item.description: Love was a cornerstone of the franchise’s success in the early 1970s. He struggled with a stutter that he overcame only after his playing days were ov...

item.title: Pizza Hut is introducing a tomato wine
